p: The chemical compositions of the essential oil of T. minuta flower are shown in Table 2 and the GC-MS analysis of the essential oil of T. minuta flower from this study revealed 98 compounds present in the essential oil. The major compounds were Î²-Ocimene (14.40%), m-tert-butyl-Phenol (9.41%), 2,6-dimethyl-, (E)-5,7-Octadien-4-one(7.14%), 1,2,3,4,4a,5,6,7-octa hydro-4a-methyl-naphthalene (5.58%), and spathulenol (4.56%) as shown in the GC-MS spectra in Fig. 1.
